text.section: An applicant for a license or a licensee is entitled to a hearing before the Commissioner if the application is denied or not acted on within a reasonable time or if the license is suspended or revoked.
An applicant or licensee that is adversely affected by an order of the Commissioner may seek judicial review of the order in accordance with § 2-215 of this article.
